mentionedBy.name: Datadog Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Open-source observability platform as strong competitor offering comprehensive monitoring at fraction of cost. Leverages ClickHouse for storage achieving 10-20x data compression, slashing storage costs by up to 80% vs Elasticsearch or SaaS tools
